DOC.detailed_description: Topiramate drug currently widely use treatment seizures adult pediatric patient ( 2 16 year age ) . This randomized , double-blind , parallel-group study evaluate effectiveness safety two dosage topiramate ( 100 200mg per day ) compare standard antiepileptic drug ( carbamazepine valproate ) patient newly diagnose epilepsy . The study compose three phase : baseline ( 7 day ) , double-blind treatment , blind extension . The double-blind phase divide two period : titration , dose drug gradually increase ( approximately 35 day ) , stabilization ( variable duration , regular schedule visit 92 day every 3 month thereafter ) . The dose study drug remain constant stabilization period . In blinded extension , patient complete double blind phase give opportunity take study medication blind fashion ( patient unaware identity drug ) . This phase continue patient leaf study data base double blind phase finalize . The primary assessment effectiveness time first seizure Day 15 study . Safety assessment include frequency adverse event study , result clinical laboratory test ( hematology biochemistry ) , measurement vital sign body weight , physical examination finding . The study hypothesis 200mg dose topiramate superior 100mg dose delay time first seizure well-tolerated .
